text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 43.89px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 43.89px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 43.89px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: -- Theurge gift
This Gift bestows understanding of the language of the spirit world,
permitting the Garou to clearly understand and speak with any
spirit he encounters. The Gift doesn’t influence spirits’ attitudes
toward the werewolf in any way, nor ensure that they have any
desire to communicate with him. Any spirit can teach it.
-- System
Once learned, this Gift allows the Garou to understand the
communication of spirits intuitively. Particularly alien spirits may be
difficult — or, in the case of many Banes, outright painful — to
understand.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: -- Homid gift
This Gift imbues a homid’s words with intrinsic credibility and
conviction, causing them to ring true to the ear and lay heavy on
the heart. An ancestor-spirit teaches this Gift.
-- System
The player rolls Charisma + Subterfuge (difficulty 7). Success lowers
the difficulty of all social rolls by one for the rest of the scene, and
allows successful rolls to have uncommonly strong impact (such as
changing long-held political views, or causing an addict to seriously
reconsider the course of his life).

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: -- Uktenas gift
The werewolf can sense the pulse and flux of mystic energies,
whether the righteous Gifts of the Garou, the arrogant wizardry of
mages, the debased powers of vampires, or even the black arts of
the Wyrm’s minions. A spirit-servant of Uktena teaches this Gift.
-- System
The player rolls Perception + Enigmas. The difficulty is based on the
strength and subtlety of the magic. The Uktena cannot tell the
exact nature of the magic, although vague clues such as "Gaian,"
“dreamcraft,” or "blood magic" might be granted with three or
more successes. The radius is 20 feet per success.

text.style: text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: start; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

g.text: WaWWoD Cross+Over Sheet 31.07 ©2024, Red Fox Studios.

text.style: text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 9.5095px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
